snippet.title: Smileys War - Game preview / gameplay
snippet.description:
http://goo.gl/7G0ph
Smileys War is a platform-based action shooter and the players goal is to defeat the other smileys around and reach the marked score. There two modes the player can choose; Arena and Challenges. The player can set up the game modes in the Arena including the number of opponents and the Goal needed. The Challenges has a fixed objective and the player must finish it to earn experience points. Guns and other types of weapons will appear on the portals automatically. The experience points can be used to purchase new maps for battle or even new custom hats for the smiley to wear.
